document_data.name: Shindreer Argonrae
document_data.mainbody: '''Shindreer Argonrae''' was a [[drow]] priestess of [[Lolth]] and an ally of [[House Auvryndar]] in the [[Troglodyte Warrens]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History: [[House Argonrae]] was a vassal ally of House Auvryndar and Shindreer acted as commander of the combined forces. However, in [[1492 DR]],{{Waterdeep-time}} [[Vlonwelv Auvryndar]] feared Shindreer's ambition and sent her to battle [[House Freth]]'s army in the Troglodyte Warrens, hoping for her death but Shindreer proved harder to kill. She was supported by a summoned [[hezrou]] in the middle of the ferocious battle with Freth troops. If nobody intervened, Shindreer won the day.
document_data.Personality: Shindreer was a powerful member of her house and fiercely hated Vlonwelv Auvryndar, hoping to depose her and gain supremacy for House Argonrae.
